articles.title: Immigration agents draw guns, arrest activists following them in Minneapolis
articles.description:
A federal judge ordered officers not to arrest motorists who are following but not obstructing their operations, but an appeals court set the order aside.

The post Immigration agents draw guns, arrest activists following them in Minneapolis appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Federal judge's order against arrests was overturned by an appeals court.
Immigration agents in Minneapolis drew guns on activists following them.
Boston residents may see increased tensions around immigration enforcement practices.

articles.title: Trump demands $1 billion from Harvard as a prolonged standoff appears to deepen
articles.description:
President Donald Trump is demanding a $1 billion payment from Harvard University to end his prolonged standoff with the Ivy League campus, doubling the amount he sought previously.

The post Trump demands $1 billion from Harvard as a prolonged standoff appears to deepen appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Trump demands $1 billion from Harvard to resolve ongoing conflict.
This amount is double his previous demand, escalating tensions.
Boston residents may face indirect consequences from Harvard's financial decisions.

articles.title: Celtics reportedly trade Anfernee Simons to Bulls, acquire Nikola Vučević
articles.description:
Nikola Vučević will add more scoring and rebounds for Boston's frontcourt.

The post Celtics reportedly trade Anfernee Simons to Bulls, acquire Nikola Vučević appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics trade Anfernee Simons to Bulls for Nikola Vučević on February 3.
Vučević expected to enhance Boston's scoring and rebounding capabilities.
Local fans anticipate improved performance in upcoming games with Vučević's addition.

articles.title: What Mike Vrabel said of Robert Kraft’s latest snub from Pro Football Hall of Fame
articles.description:
"He's more than deserving, and he'll be in the Hall of Fame."

The post What Mike Vrabel said of Robert Kraft’s latest snub from Pro Football Hall of Fame appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Mike Vrabel praised Robert Kraft's contributions to the NFL and Hall of Fame candidacy.
Kraft has yet to be inducted into the Pro Football Hall of Fame despite his achievements.
Local fans express disappointment over Kraft's continued exclusion from the Hall of Fame.

articles.title: Families of Revere women who died in Belize hotel file wrongful death lawsuit against resort, Expedia
articles.description:
Wafae El-Arar, Kaoutar Naqqad, and Imane Mallah died of carbon monoxide poisoning while staying at a Belize hotel in February 2025.

The post Families of Revere women who died in Belize hotel file wrongful death lawsuit against resort, Expedia appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Families of three Revere women filed a lawsuit for wrongful death after hotel carbon monoxide poisoning.
Wafae El-Arar, Kaoutar Naqqad, and Imane Mallah died in February 2025 while vacationing in Belize.
The lawsuit targets the resort and Expedia, highlighting safety concerns for Boston travelers.
